LanguageData.AteTangYuan.stages.0.label: Tasted the delicious dumplings
LanguageData.AteTangYuan.stages.0.description: A poet named JiangBaiShi said:"When you hook the curtain to see the Royal Street, the treasures of the city come for a while." It's a rare and beautiful thing to be able to enjoy a bowl of Tangyuan slowly in the chaotic and dangerous rimworld!
LanguageData.AteWorkedRawFood.stages.0.label: Ate raw food after preliminary treatment
LanguageData.AteWorkedRawFood.stages.0.description: Even though the raw food has been roughly processed, although it is better than raw food, it still tastes like chewing wax. We should cook it.
LanguageData.AteHunTun.stages.0.label: Tasted the delicious wonton
LanguageData.AteHunTun.stages.0.description: Chinese poet said:"Once the gangsters of wontons, it is better to have many dishes." A bowl of delicious wontons nourished my body and soul! This is the taste of home!
LanguageData.AteJiaoZi.stages.0.label: Tasted delicious Baozi
LanguageData.AteJiaoZi.stages.0.description: Chinese poet said:"Put the chopsticks and rub your belly, Hutong breaks the small group." After a few buns were eaten, my stomach almost couldn't fit! This bun is really an artifact to relieve hunger!
LanguageData.AteManTou.stages.0.label: Tasted delicious steamed buns
LanguageData.AteManTou.stages.0.description: Chinese poet said:"The world's best bamboo shoots and cakes, the world is Jichu mushroom steamed buns." After a few steamed buns, I feel that I am now full of motivation again!
LanguageData.AteHuoGuo.stages.0.label: Tasted delicious hot pot
LanguageData.AteHuoGuo.stages.0.description: Chinese poet said:"Spicy, liver and intestines are like a river of fire, drips of sweat and water make it difficult to cover it." I enjoyed a hot pot with all the ingredients and meat and vegetables, even though I felt that my internal organs were about to burn. But this is really a rare delicacy in the world!
LanguageData.AteBaoBing.stages.0.label: Tasted delicious griddle cake
LanguageData.AteBaoBing.stages.0.description: Chinese poet said:"One furnace and one saucer by the side of the road, oiled green onion and egg yolk." I tasted a delicious pancake. Although the pancake seemed to be small in quantity, my stomach was really full after eating it!
LanguageData.AteChaoFan.stages.0.label: Tasted delicious fried rice
LanguageData.AteChaoFan.stages.0.description: Chinese poet said:"The fragrance is overflowing in the courtyard, and the aftertaste is endless." I tasted a delicious fried rice, which was delicious and delicious!
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa.stages.0.label: Ate the old godmother
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa.stages.0.description: There is a godmother in this dish, it tastes really good!
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa.stages.1.label: Ate the old godmother(+1)
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa.stages.1.description: There is a godmother in this dish, it tastes really good! It's just that the body is a little uncomfortable.
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa.stages.2.label: Ate the old godmother(+1)
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa.stages.2.description: There is a godmother in this dish, it tastes really good! It's just that the body is a little uncomfortable.
LanguageData.AteLaJiao.stages.0.label: Ate raw Spicy oil
LanguageData.AteLaJiao.stages.0.description: I feel like I'm about to shed tears, we shouldn't eat this stuff raw!
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.0.label: Panda leather{0}
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.0.descrip: Wearing clothes made of panda leather makes me uncomfortable. We should not slaughter this cherished animal.
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.1.label: Panda leather{0} (+1)
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.1.descrip: I feel very uncomfortable. The shadow of a panda always appears in front of my eyes.
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.2.label: Panda leather{0} (+2)
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.2.descrip: I feel true, I am going crazy, it must be because of this panda skin!
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.3.label: Panda leather{0} etc
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi_Void.stages.3.descrip: I want to take it off, take it off! There are panda corpses all around me! This is not true! My brain is going to explode now!
LanguageData.LookJingJu.stages.0.label: Revel in the artistic conception of Peking Opera
"Talking to Liyuan with white head and tears, Yu Luen fifty years ago." This kind of opera tune from ancient time and space echoed deeply in my mind. It was the world that everyone had longed for!
LanguageData.Chi_TraA_Effect.stages.0.label: Scholars of profound learning
LanguageData.Chi_TraA_Effect.stages.0.description: Learning without thinking is useless, thinking without learning is dangerous. I'm happy to have a childlike heart for a long time.
LanguageData.Chi_TraA_RuJiaChat.stages.0.label: Exchange of Chinese traditional culture
LanguageData.Chi_TraA_Mood.stages.0.label: Exchange of Chinese traditional culture
LanguageData.Chi_TraA_Mood.stages.0.description: I was deeply impressed by the exchange of Chinese traditional culture with a companion who was full of poetry and books.
LanguageData.Chi_TraA_RuJiaChat_Chuan.stages.0.label: Spread Chinese traditional culture to others
Spread Chinese traditional culture to others
LanguageData.Chi_TraA_RuJiaChat_Chuan.stages.0.descri: It makes me happy to spread Chinese traditional culture to others.
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.0.label: Panda leather{0}
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.0.description: Wearing clothes made of panda leather makes me uncomfortable. We should not slaughter this cherished animal.
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.1.label: Panda leather{0} (+1)
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.1.description: I feel very uncomfortable. The shadow of a panda always appears in front of my eyes.
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.2.label: Panda leather{0} (+2)
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.2.description: I feel true, I am going crazy, it must be because of this panda skin!
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.3.label: Panda leather{0} etc
LanguageData.Thought_XiongMaoPi.stages.3.description: I want to take it off, take it off! There are panda corpses all around me! This is not true! My brain is going to explode now!
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa_Sheng.stages.0.label: Eat the old godmother raw
LanguageData.AteLaoGanMa_Sheng.stages.0.description: It's so spicy. We should mix some other staple food!
LanguageData.AiJiuHigh.stages.0.label: Moxibustion relaxation
LanguageData.AiJiuHigh.stages.0.description: I recently used moxibustion, which makes me feel very comfortable.
LanguageData.Chi_ExtraC_ThoughtSocial.stages.0.label: Noble medical ethics
LanguageData.AteDengYingNiuRou.stages.0.label: The delicious Dengying Beef was tasted
LanguageData.AteDengYingNiuRou.stages.0.description: I recently tasted a piece of Dengying Beef. It's spicy, crisp and delicious. It tastes very good!
LanguageData.AteMeiCaiKouRou.stages.0.label: I tasted the steamed pork with plum vegetables
LanguageData.AteMeiCaiKouRou.stages.0.description: It is fat but not greasy, and has a strong aroma. Lean meat is more delicious after absorbing the soup. This feeling is unique and memorable!
LanguageData.AteBaiGuoJiu.stages.0.label: Bitter Ginkgo Wine
LanguageData.AteBaiGuoJiu.stages.0.description: Although the effect of ginkgo wine is particularly good, and it is also made from pure natural ginkgo, I still find it difficult to accept such a taste.
LanguageData.AteBeiJingKaoYa.stages.0.label: Tasted Peking Duck
LanguageData.AteBeiJingKaoYa.stages.0.description: The color is red, the meat is tender, the taste is mellow, and it is fat but not greasy. This unique taste has left a deep impression on me.
LanguageData.AteZongZi.stages.0.label: Tasted the delicious rice dumplings
LanguageData.AteZongZi.stages.0.description: "Pu Ye Wu Dao Lu, Jun Tong Chu Zong Xiang." This is a feeling of reunion and warmth!
LanguageData.AteMenMian.stages.0.label: Tasted delicious braised noodles
LanguageData.AteMenMian.stages.0.description: Special products from the north of China's mother country, took away all my hunger!
LanguageData.Thought_ZhongHuaJiuLei.stages.0.label: Shenzhou Liquor-Slightly Drunk
LanguageData.Thought_ZhongHuaJiuLei.stages.0.descript: This is a mixture of some herbs and alcohol, which makes my body and mind feel good relaxation
LanguageData.Thought_ZhongHuaJiuLei.stages.1.label: Shenzhou Liquor-a little drunk
LanguageData.Thought_ZhongHuaJiuLei.stages.1.descript: Even though I am a little shaky walking now, I am really happy
LanguageData.Thought_ZhongHuaJiuLei.stages.2.label: Shenzhou Liquor-Intoxication
LanguageData.Thought_ZhongHuaJiuLei.stages.2.descript: The wine from China makes me deeply intoxicated! I feel that my metabolism has been accelerated, and the pain seems to disappear completely! This feeling is so wonderful!
LanguageData.Thought_ZhongHuaJiuLei.stages.3.label: Shenzhou Liquorâ€”Drunk as Mud
LanguageData.AteYueBing.stages.0.label: Tasted moon cakes
LanguageData.AteYueBing.stages.0.description: "The biscuits are like chewing the moon, with crisp and sweetmeat in them." The atmosphere of reunion is really good.
LanguageData.AteShiTouGan.stages.0.label: Tasted moon cakes
LanguageData.AteShiTouGan.stages.0.description: This food tastes moderately sweet and sour, and tastes very good, just like fruit candy!
LanguageData.AteYaShiXiang.stages.0.label: Drank duck feces tea
LanguageData.AteYaShiXiang.stages.0.description: Duck dung scent has a complex aroma of partial almond, silver flower, delicate fragrance, and elegant ginger floral fragrance. The mouth is rich and refreshing, with a distinctive floral fragrance and special mountain charm! This scent makes me feel very comfortable, and it is difficult to dissipate in my heart for a long time.
LanguageData.AteWuYiYanCha.stages.0.label: Drank Wuyi Rock Tea
LanguageData.AteWuYiYanCha.stages.0.description: This scent of rock bone flower makes me feel very good!
LanguageData.AteSuanCai.stages.0.label: Tasted food containing sauerkraut
LanguageData.AteSuanCai.stages.0.description: There are sauerkraut in this dish, sour and salty, the taste is really good!
LanguageData.AteSuanCai.stages.1.label: Tasted food containing sauerkraut(+1)
LanguageData.AteSuanCai.stages.1.description: There are sauerkraut in this dish, sour and salty, the taste is really good!
LanguageData.AteSuanCai.stages.2.label: Tasted food containing sauerkraut(+2)
LanguageData.AteSuanCai.stages.2.description: There are sauerkraut in this dish, sour and salty, the taste is really good!

LanguageData.AteSuanCai.stages.3.description: There are sauerkraut in this dish, sour and salty, the taste is really good!
